modName: Remove the Clouds and Fog from Map - and other map tweaks
summary: Remove the clouds and fog from the mini map.
descriptionHtml:
Video of before and after in HD (ahhyeaaah.jpg) at http://youtu.be/iWCiUhZy_uk

Remove the cloud textures from your map by entering this value 

[MapMenu]
sMapCloudNIF=0
bWorldMapNoSkyDepthBlur=1
fWorldMapNearDepthBlurScale=0
fWorldMapDepthBlurScale=0
fWorldMapMaximumDepthBlur=0

at the end of your C:\\Users\\YOURNAME\\Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim\\Skyrim.ini
author: sval
